page.title: 13Teenagers in Deanshanger
page.content: A group of six children attending Kingsbrook School,Stratford Road, Deanshanger,Northants. were interviewed to try and find out about their attitudes to their lives futures and surroundings. They were nearing the end of their fourth year at the school and would be taking public exams the following summer,after which most of them would be leaving school.Some 700 children attended the school.They all agreed they were happy at school and fortunate to have good facilities and a good working atmosphere.They felt that their school benefitted from being outside the city of Milton Keynes,in a village setting,and from drawing its children from similar village backgrounds.They felt that they belonged to the school.
